Coroner rules Wairarapa toddler Ashton Cresswell died from ‘violent, traumatic’ injuries https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coroner-rules-wairarapa-toddler-ashton-cresswell-died-from-violent-traumatic-injuries/IIWSFUVMZBBVBIW4Q4GIT5ON7A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coroner-rules-wairarapa-toddler-ashton-cresswell-died-from-violent-traumatic-injuries/IIWSFUVMZBBVBIW4Q4GIT5ON7A/ The 4-year-old died in his Pahīatua home in 2017. Fri, 25 Oct 2024 07:35:06 +0000 A coroner inquiry into the death of Ashton Cresswell in 2017 has found the little boy died from injuries sustained in a “violent and traumatic event” while in the care of his mother and her partner.
